name: Death
fortune_telling: A relationship or illness ends suddenly

light: Bringing an unpleasant phase of life to an end
Recognizing and celebrating the conclusion of something
Leaving one person, place, or thing for another
shadow: Refusing to give up old habits or unhealthy relationships
Insisting that everything and everyone should stay the same forever
Failing to take good care of yourself

mythical_spiritual: Christ in the tomb. Hades. Hypnos. Thanatos. Stories of journeys into the underworld.
questions_to_ask: How might an ending actually be a blessing in this situation?
